title: Best of British: Triumph
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobiles - Design and construction
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobile industry and trade
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Automobile industry and trade
description: Episode of Series "Best of British". Triumph is one of the greatest names in British motorcycle history. This documentary follows the story of the Triumph motorcycle from its beginnings in Coventry just after the turn of the century, to its resurrection in the late eighties. The turbulent history of the Triumph company is revealed through interviews with key figures associated with the Triumph name and significant Triumph models of the past and present are discussed in detail.
